description: This will read Bible and Book of Mormon scriptures using Alexa's built-in text to speech engine. This currently is a work in progress but you should be able to speak naturally asking for the book, chapter, and verse you would like Alexa to read to you.
exampleInteractions: Alexa ask Gospel Library to Read Mosiah 3 verse 16
Alexa ask Gospel Library for Scripture Mastery
name: Gospel Library Reader
shortDescription: Scripture reader that is fast and easy!
